Package game.utils

Class RuneManager

java.lang.Object
game.utils.RuneManager
public class RuneManager extends Object
A rune manager class that helps to manage the player's runes. The Rune that this class is managing will be the player's rune.
Author:
Liew Dong Xun

    • dropRune

      public void dropRune(Location location)
      Method to drop rune at a location. Will also ensure that only one rune is on the map at all times.
      Parameters:
      location - location to drop the rune (player's location)

      Method to get the random number that is generated
